name: Flappy Plane (gustavohitz)
description:
It's Flappy Bird with planes. Play it either in single player mode or multiplayer with a friend, where you can revive each other when one of you crashes. You get a medal depending on your score. 

This is yet another game I have created in a Unity/C# course I'm taking. Enjoy!

Commands:

Single Player: Left-mouse button to fly;

Multiplayer: "A" and "L" to fly.

Press ESC to go back to main menu.
